content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? i was taking a walk in the later evening about dusk to get some steps in for the day. the sighting was around 730p est, in newnan, ga, about 15 miles south of hartsfield jackson airport.

2. what made you first notice the object? there 2 very bright lights in the sky, not airplane lights. living so close to the airport i see airplane lights all the time and know the landing patterns of the planes. they were out of the landing path from the west and east of the directions of the planes in the area. the orb lights stood out like a sore thumb. the orbs were also closer together than any planes would be on approach to the airport. 

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? airplanes

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. 2 very round, circular, glowing orbs. like perfect glowing circles. almost star like in color. after taking the pictures with an iphone 6s +, i zoomed in to see if i can get a better look. in the middle of the orbs there seems to be something in the middle of each of them, but not sure if it is just distortion or not. 

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. i always look for ufo's, so i was excited that this could be my first potential sighting. i had no other feelings other than excitement. i texted my buddy the picture and he check flightradar24 and nothing on the app showing aircraft in the area matching the two orbs in that area. i am always skeptical of ever seeing anything like this, but this was different than anything i have ever seen before.

6. how did you lose sight of the object? total sighting was about 10 minutes for me. i wasn't 100% sure, so i started walking down the hill to my house. i as started walking each orb went in separate directions in slow controlled line. it was odd to me that they were going the opposite direction of the landing patterns of the planes. they went below the tree line (in the pictures) and didn't see them again.
content.summary: Two glowing orbs stationary then each went separate ways

content.detailedDescription: Flying object hovering and changeing direction at high altitude .Bright lights pulsating from object.Airplane observed inn area.Smaller object also observed pulsating lights at high altitude.Both object changeing path fast to different location in the night sky.
content.summary: Strange flying object

content.detailedDescription: I was sent upstairs to go to my room so i could go to bed it was around 10:20 and i saw it out the window and it was a bright yellow object when i first saw it i was scared and curious i looked at it for about 25 seconds it ascended and descended and then crashed then it stoped it completely disappeared a few days later the tree in front of my house that the use crashed by had to be cut down and evercenss that day i have felt different changed in a way that is impossible to explain and sense then sometimes i fell like i'm a different person
content.summary: I was startled it was nothing of this world

content.detailedDescription: 2012 i summited mt. adams with 2 friends. after arriving at camp at 8645feet we decided to set up two go pros to film the sunset, one go pro 2 the other a gopro3. we placed the 2 on time-lapse and the 3 on video 25 feet apart from each other. the time-lapse was accidentally set on 1 minute intervals, the other 30fps 1080p hd video. while we were eating dinner we observed a object that looked unfamiliar and even in the video two of us are discussing what it could be although neither one of us had remembered the conversation. in the video we start to eat and stop watching the object toward the end which is the section of the video the object dematerializes. we continued to summit the next day and return to portland. for 3 years the video sat on a hard drive. i was cleaning up my hard drive when i first discovered the object in the video clip. i was very confused as to the conversation we had in the video as someone asks me if the object is a airplane and i reply, "if not its a ufo". i had no recollection of ever saying that. examining the video, and running it thru basic filters on imovie, it became quite obvious to me that what i had recorded was a disk in a slow spin which appears to be skipping but i believe the skipping illusion was caused by whatever powered this craft because the object skips along in the video, and its is a solid disk in the 3 photos captured by the gopro2. i believe the illusion of skipping is caused by a distortion by whatever powers the object. all 3 photos taken show a solid disk with a light upper and a dark lower. i have 3 photos and one 5 minute video with a 2 minute 50 second sighting. on december 31st 2014 at new years, roughly a few days after i had discovered the video, my wife, my climbing partner and i were on my porch celebrating new years eve. at exactly the change of new year, a disk illuminated 500 yards above the broadway bridge, the disk was stationary and had a bubbled center with a tracer type light circling the disk before it went dark. i saw a clear bubble shape in the lower center and the disk was completely stationary. after 5 seconds the disk slowly started moving west toward the coast and as it got directly over portland a "orb" came around the side of my building, 8th floor, and stopped directly in front of all 3 of us for about 3 to 5 seconds. the appearance of the "ball" looked like a rock, there was no smooth surface, and the movement was irregular like if a nickel was put into a blown up balloon and tossed. it then shot up into the air and went directly toward the disk. i lost sight of both as the went over the hill behind portland toward beaverton or. i will upload a photo taken, but the video file i will only give to someone who takes interest. i have tried other resources getting help with this and have had no luck, no one has the photos or video file. the video i put together was recently shown at the roswell ufo festival 2016.
content.summary: A massive skipping disk that dematerialized

content.detailedDescription:
Three nights after my report case# 79826
at 2:25am i was sitting outside, looking in my backyard again. a light, from a car was what i first thought, was shining on my shed. it moved to the right and stopped. i could see straight light going from the top to the bottom. it even lite the top peak of the shed and you can see the holes in it. i moved to the edge of the deck when it didn't go off or move again. then i realized there was no other areas with lights. there was no light on the handles. i stared into the holes at the top and saw, just for 2 seconds, a red light in one of the holes. it looked like the light was coming from the inside of the shed and shining through the panels of the shed walls. then it just turned off.
content.summary: While sitting in backyard a light scanned across my shed. it went left to right then slightly back right to left

content.detailedDescription: Around 11 o'clock at babi yar park in denver 4 of my friends and i were filming a video project for school. i looked up for some reason i don't know what caused me to but when i did i saw an object. this object looks like a b-52 bomber but it was dark and made no noise. the object had a leading edge of 10 lights with one in the center and 4 on the sides of the leading edge of the wings, and appear to be black as if painted matte black. the object was flying southwest about 2000 feet off the ground i'd say can't couldn't really tell due to clouds being in the sky and no reference points but it was moving at around 300 miles an hour i asked my friends to look up and immediately 3 of the 4 saw the object.  my other friend did not have his glasses with him so he could not view the object  but did claim to see a blob in the sky flying. after a period of 15 seconds after tracking since first seeing the object made a shallow bank southward and disappeared into the night sky probably due to blending in with the night.
content.summary: B-2 in shape. 10 faint orange lights on leading edge

content.detailedDescription: Was walking my dog, i looked up and saw these lights in the distance, thought they were random stars until i noticed they were moving in circles, hovering and then going down and back up again. i lost them due to the trees in the distance.
content.summary: Three yellow orbs moving in circles in the distance, like playing catch with eachother.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard feeding the dog then i walk around the pool and it was full moon
due to what happened to me this afternoon while i was driving from home going west at about 12 noontime i noticed reflection of silver big cigar shape object coming from north going southern and it was not a plane at all and it was amazing speeding .
based on that experience i start to look up more than usual then i had that sighting at beginning of the night.
by the way that was my third experience because i had one more in 1984 in cairo egypt 
my feeling is mixed between happy and waiting for more
content.summary: Light appears above my backyard trees at about 7 pm and was hovering and i thought it's aircraft when it did not moved i start recording

content.detailedDescription:
It was almost 8:30 when i was sitting on the couch with my nephew watching a movie. relatively dark in the house and the windows were open so we could see out to the night sky.
my nephew suddenly shook my shoulder and said it was a ufo, and normally when he says that its usually an airplane or helicopter. but when i looked it was just a white orb/blimp flying across the sky. just above the treeline. we observed for a few seconds and we went outside on the porch to get a better look, my dog was in his kennel by the door but he was barking more than usual that night. he never barks when we go in and out during the night. he continued to bark until we came back in 5 minutes later.
we had observed the white blimp and i had noticed it was traveling much faster than the usual airplanes we see at night. and we had also saw another aircraft above the white blimp, it had seemed to be following after the light. that aircraft had been blinking red and white. but as it had gotten farther away, it started blinking red/orange, but i am not sure if it had disappeared when i put my phone down or if that was the other aircraft, the trees had gotten in the way after and i had lost sight of the object.
i have included the 3 pictures i had taken on my iphone 6s plus. it would not show up on video. and the aircraft above the blimp would not show up either.
content.summary: Flew across the sky, faster than a plane. helicopter/plane/ other aircraft was above and following the ufo.

content.detailedDescription: Driving in the desert - i95 from vegas to laughlin appeard to be rectangle with steady bright lights.  stationary at first. then appeared to come closer then follow on the passenger side of the car.  stayed about a half of a mile away. followed for a good 20 to 30 minutes.  no landmarks for specific location.  as we started into the mountains it stopped. shot what looked like ir lights then began abrupt direction north.  shot out of sight in less than 1 minute.
content.summary: Driving i95 from vegas to laughlin appeard to be rectangle with steady bright lights.  stationary at first.

content.detailedDescription:
1. throwing rocks at a lake
2. my dad
3. an airplane
4. a green light, blinking randomly, flew over the horizon, and when it was directly overhead, a red light started blinking near it, then they froze for about three seconds, then they started shooting little white beams of light at each other and abruptly changed direction. across the lake, a really bright flashed suddenly, and they blinked around each other until they blinked of the horizon. after that i forgot about it for about three weeks until one night about three weeks later a light flashed over my house and i heard a whump-whump-whump noise and the light disappeared.
5. i was really scared, because we were camping, and i felt really strange in the following days.
6. it went over the horizon.
content.summary: Frightening

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my backyard. my view is the back of houses on the street behind. i was just looking around when i thought i saw something move. the third house to my left is a two story house with brick first floor and siding on the second floor. i continued looking, between the two upstair windows was a black rectangle. it started moving around between the two windows. it then started circling the window on the right. this went on for what seemed like 10-15 minutes. shortly after it stopped, maybe 5 minutes later, a dim light appeared under the full length of the roof line. it was only for a few seconds, it then appeared the same way and place on the bungalow to the right.

i was confused as to what could make black rectangles appear on a flat surface and was moving around in no particular pattern. why could i see a black rectangle in the dark of night? i just sat there until it stopped.
content.summary: Black rectangle moving on back of house in my backyard. 5-10 after that event dim light appeared under and the length of roof line then disappeared and was on the house beside it.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke, letting the dogs out and a light flew from the south to the north in under 3 seconds. i thought it was a flare at first and was waiting for it to go out. it continued to shine until i lost site of it due to obstruction. still can't believe it happened, i checked a trusted flight radar site and there was nothing that flew that direction. there was nothing in my area at that time.
content.summary: Very fast red orange orb

content.detailedDescription: At dusk, myself and my roomate had just walked out of our woods after a short small game hunting trip. our other roomate was standing in the driveway facing west just staring at something in the sky. we said "hey whats up?"..He just pointed at this classic black triangle tr-3b style craft without losing his focus on it. so at that moment i pulled my phone out to capture it on film or at least get a picture, but the craft wouldnt show up on my screen in the shot. almost like it was cloaked, but we could still see it with the naked eye. it was moving less than 100mph easily, it seemed as if it would just fall from the sky it was moving so slow. the altitude it was at is unknown because i dont know how large it was, but it seemed to be only a few hundred feet in the air and very big. it was so close i felt like i could reach out and touch it. it was loud like a airliner as it was coming at us, but was silent when it was above us, and had a quiet hum that almost made you want to vomit as it flew away to the east. none of us had any fear, we all swemed pretty calm, if not "amazed". it had small squared windows on the side, three red lights on the corners of the undercarriage, a big white light in the center of the undercarriage, and a vertically vented rear "thruster" area. there is always ufo activity out there, some at space altitudes, and some closer. but this was the only one weve ever been able to clearly make out what it was. surely other farmers and local saw the craft.
content.summary: Black triangle craft flew over our home very slowly at dusk. myself and 2 others witnessed the craft.

content.detailedDescription:
1 i was getting out of the house walking to my car. i am on a 2nd floor and have a clear view towards the hills where i saw the object.

2 i saw a white flash in the corner of my eye wich made me turn mi sight towards the object. probably the flash was emmited by the object.

3. i thought it was a blimp because of the shape, or maybe a drone.

4. after the flash i noticed the object wich was moving slowly towards south. then it either flipped or changed shape. now it was looking more like a rectangle. then i tought it could be a drone. but then it either dissappeared behind a cloud. this made me change my mind about the size. no drone flies that high. the color was gray. non reflective. there was no sun at the time of the sighting. no other flash was emited. the event lasted less than a minute. my guess is it was about 2-3 miles away (because that's my estimate of the distance of the clouds it went into) wich makes me guess that the size was about 70ft.

5. at first i was confused, no plane flies that slow and it had no rotors so it was not a helicopter. then when i couldn't tell the exact shape i got excited and tried to go get the binoculars but didn't want to miss it. by then it had already dissappeared wich left me more confused.

6. it went behind a cloud.
content.summary: White flash, slowly moving south, then dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My sister in law called my wife telling her when she went to store near hobby airport she found bunch a people, hispanics, talking outside the store about a fallen object. they say within minutes men in black suits and vans came to secure the place. they said other people dressing like nasa with coveralls were looking at this object. they covered the object in yellow tarp and put it on truckbed. as they were driving away, they heard noises coming from the covered object.
content.summary: Ufo falls in houston near hobby airport

content.detailedDescription: On montana canadian border radar cameras observed solid disk hovering in light of setting sun. due to obvious reasons details cannot be given in this forum. however i do have details showing exact location and duration of event. observed by several camera operators as well as supervisor. disk hovered stationary for several moments
content.summary: Solid disk observed on border patrol stationary cameras

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were laying in the  backyard in the pool so naturally i was staring at the sky and we live on a flight route from boise. so i'm used to seeing a lot of planes and king is going over and i also come from an air force military background. so i was i was laying there looking up i noticed that it looked like there was this bright star even know it was on the 830  and there really wasn't much for stars out yet at least not in that area, so as i watch this i noticed that it never moved even though there how did the trade rooms up there and it was kind of a blustery day so i yelled out my neighbor to take a look and see if he had any opinions on what it might be because i thought maybe it was the star and he said  no it's in the wrong area, thought maybe possibly a satellite since it's orbiting around it would travel with this and not moving. but isaac got my attention more i started the video and take pictures and then i happen to have a telescope sitting on the porch so i tried focusing my iphone 6s plus which has a pretty  good camera through the lens of the telescope although it was shaky i could see a little more detail. so after toiling over talking about it and hearing other people mention it i'm not understanding what it can bs just kind of put it in the back of my head and had these pictures.  and after talking to my father which is part of saturday and was fine he said that i should probably send this to him just to have it looked at so here i am. i would so much love in answer to this. thank you for any opinions and help you can give, , i think it's the not knowing and the questioning it is bugging the crap out of me. fyi i'm not some your final night or conspiracy but i do believe in a higher arrive from dennis and i've seen a lot of things in my life to show me  may show me i may be right. but this made my hair stand on and i'm creeped me out same with my neighbor and friends i've talked to that side as well hope to hear from you. i had expecting as a place to put my videos and pictures the bigger one that you can see the dot in the center were taken and blown up on my iphone several times maybe you have better equipment that can do better job
content.summary: I noticed a bright orb in the sky that never moved for over a hour.I could see it rotat with a dark build in the center with what looked like notches or windows, a plane flew by,seemed much further a way and much bigger,i have awsome pics and video

content.detailedDescription:
I received these images from a friend's mother, who works at the school were our children attend. she has given her permission to submit these images and her story as we would like to find out what they may be. i was not a witness to this incident, but, i also am trying to find answers as this took place at an elementary school where the children were present at the time. it was a cloudy morning. her co-worker and her where taking pictures of the sun peeking over the clouds and did not see anything unusual at the time. it wasn't until they reviewed the images later in the evening that they noticed the anomaly. both images were taken at the same place not long apart. unfortunately i do not know which image was taken first. here is her experience in her own words:

the date was wednesday october 12th. the picture was taken at 9:34 am. we were on the playground of the connally school. we had been taking pictures of the kids playing and i noticed a big black cloud. i love looking at clouds so i decided to take a picture of the dark cloud with the sun coming up from behind it. i never noticed anything in the sky while taking the picture and neither did my coworker. later that day i was looking at the picture and noticed the purple spot on it so i enlarged it to look at it and i was surprised at what i saw. after looking at my picture i looked at my friends picture. she didn't notice anything on her picture at the time. when she saw my picture posted on fb then she went back and looked at hers.

i have attached both images, as well as her personal image she cropped to enlarge it. thank you for your time. and i guarantee we will be watching the sky over the school a lot more closely.
content.summary: Anomaly in clouds over elementary school playground. not visible to the witnesses at the time.

content.detailedDescription: For the past two weeks every night between the hours of 7 and 9 at night me and my entire family and some of my nieboors have witnessed this ufo every night like clockwork it it shoots into our atmosphere and it looks like a metiorit the way it zooms down in our atmosphere and once it gets to a certain altitude under the clouds and screeches to almost a complete stop planes can't do this. after it comes to almost a complete stop it starts moving from west to east every night at a very low rate of speed flying very sparatically. last night for the first time i took a very high powered flash light and would point it at the ufo almost like i was doing an sos with the light turning it on and off. and as soon as i did this and pointed this light at the sphere shaped very bright object as soon as the light hit it the ufo turned on this almost like force field green aura light around the craft and started so ing me back with the most brilliant green aura looking force field light my eyes have ever seen. this has been every night for the last couple weeks and um pretty sure it will appear again tonight. the green aura force field this craft turned on looked just like the aurora bori alies. green lights i've never witnessed anything more beautiful in my life. every day it shoots in our atmosphere it seems to be a little closer to the ground than the previous day. i've been using my mind to summon them and it seems to be working this craft responded to my light and so s ne right back. this is not a plane this is not a chinese lantern this is a ufo like it or not and they been trying to communicate with me i think because i'm so open minded. i'll bet my ass it will be back tonight. my girlfriend has seen it my son has seen it my best friend seen it my best friends mom and dad seen this thing and a few other people think is a ufo i beleave it is pilot ted by either the greys or the nordics these are the two species of eti i've been trying to communicate with it will be back too
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: For the past two weeks every night between the hours of 7 and 9 at night me and my entire family and some of my nieboors have witnessed this ufo every night like clockwork it it shoots into our atmosphere and it looks like a metiorit the way it zooms down

content.detailedDescription:
October 12, 2016 - 7:15 - 7:45 am.
 
first spotted on w. 8th around 7:15 am. was generally cloudless heading eastbound, around sunrise.

i noticed a weird cloud that was all alone and out of place, very thin and reflective. i saw a plane fly by going east and compared the two
and the plane reflected a different shape and shadow and reflection than the “shiny cloud”.

mentioned it to my husband on west broadway just passed fraser.  i had told him i was irritated because the trees were blocking my view of
a weird could i  was looking at for about 3-4 min before.
 
then the view opened and he saw it.  we watched it in the sky together for probably 10 – 15 minutes at minimum from broadway and then onto the hwy. 

it appeared closer around renfrew and looked farther away on hwy 1.
it didn’t change its angle or shape, just distance.
 
took first pics at w. broadway and nanaimo and then at w. broadway and renfrew around 7:35 and zoomed in on the object to max zoom on my lg g4 phone.

took 1 minute video around 7:40am on hwy 1 off boundary going east and you can see it in the video.  it kind of looks like it moves at the end of the video but i cant tell if its the way we are driving or the video.  the video was taken zoomed in so it is a bit shaky.

as my husband was dropping me off at work, i zoomed into pics, around 7:45am and saw the “windows” or whatever they are.
 
i was quite unnerved and felt uneasy. i have had trouble sleeping this week just because i know what it was.
content.summary: Shiny object spotted in clear morning sky, viewed by me and my husband for approx. 25 min. took photos and video.

content.detailedDescription: Im a truck driver and i've been watering county roads for a while . i happened to run low on water so, i went to a water pond hooked up my water lines turned my pto and waited to fill up . i then leaned on my the back of my tanker facing north when i felt something over my right shoulder when i looked up i saw a chrome object in a cruise like speed heading south east then it vanished above it was a jetliner going by then my tanker was already full tanker takes from 20-30 minutes to fill up....?
content.summary: So im a truck driver and i was filling my tancker with water from a water pond when i felt something over my right shoulder looked up and saw a chrome like object just hovering in a cruise like then vanished above that was an airliner going south

content.detailedDescription:
Nicolaus copernicus discovered the 13.500 old allspark in antarctica.

heliocentric system - cartographie. the us government is hiding the allspark at area 51 (north las vegas) groom lake rd. nevada (us). the artificial intelligence was built in cooperation with the allspark - neural network. (tat-14)

world disclosure !!!
content.summary: The allspark is in area 51

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my apartment balcony.

then, when viewed in the air i saw a sky identity of unidentified bodies.

this flying object went straight for a while.


i was not afraid. i was just excited. follow us know that we are frankly terrifying presence of the other.

to contribute to the mufon website i offer this report.
content.summary: after flying for about 2 minutes gone in an instant

content.detailedDescription:
Last night, oct 14th, i was parked outside a swim facility waiting for a practice session to end when something caught my eye. i was facing almost due east, looking at a full moon. with buildings obscuring the distant horizon, in came to view a single, radiant orange glow, such as reminded me of a hot air balloon heater, but without the balloon. intensity pulsated   irregularly, the way flames do, not rythmically. nothing was blinking. it was silent. it was moving at a steady pace. i'd use the word gliding. my impression was that it was 500-1000 ft off the ground, but the way the moon lit the background, it was hard to discern. if it was at a height in that proximity, it must have been cruising at a speed of 100 mph. at that point i was siting in my car, radio low, windows down with the temp about 66°f. then a saw an identical light come into view along the same path. it occurred to me the first could be teathered to the second. their relative distance seemed that consistent at that point.

when the second one showed up, i grabbed my iphone and stepped out of the car. i couldn't come up with anything that explained what i was seeing, and figured i'd try and capture it. the phone cam could barely capture the lights, and of course, they were tiny on screen. at the point the first one was overhead, i saw a third come into view. at this point it was clear these were not on an identical track, but it was as if they were generally moving along the same path. then, two more for a total of five "things", i was looking between. these flamy-glowy things were of the same shape and intensity whether they were approaching me, over me, or going away from me. at no point could i find evidence of sound. their paths bent toward the north slightly. way off in the distance, the first gave me the impression it had slowed down, as if it were letting the second take over the lead. my vision isn't the sharpest, but the state doesn't require me to wear glasses, if that's any indication of my visual acuity. it was damp enough it was hazy, but i remember no clouds. i never saw any intense acceleration. i never saw anything jerky. intensity of the glow never varied.  they each, in turn, exceeded my ability to see them until they had all gone. i looked around to see if there was anyone else that might have been looking at me, or perhaps had seen what i had seen. no one. 

i have lived near lambert international airport, and later, near scott afb my entire life. i watched with enjoyment, all manner of aircraft, large and small, over my years. it didn't feel like jets. it didn't feel like helecopters. i think of myself as a fairly analytical, discerning, creative and bright fellow, and i cannot explain what i saw. felt the need to share.
content.summary: I saw a group of five lights, orange, non-flashing, position and directionally varying liesurly chasing each other at various intervals.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving one the hutch to go to work, i was nearing 26w where i always exist. 

2. i looked up, honestly idk why since i was driving but there were a lot of start out and it was beautiful.

3.I notice how odd those stars look, they were green and in a huge disk-like shape.

4. i immediately realized starts don't move like that and knew what it was.  it was very slow, but it just glided it tinted at first then it just glided away.

5.  after realizing it was to wide to be stars and how it camouflaged with the night sky but you could see those green lights.  what scared me was the size on that thing, it was huge! it was a huge saucer!  i kept screaming "omg omg" and it happen to quickly i couldn't get my phone out in time and also i was driving.  there was a plane and a helicopter in the sky aswell, the helicopter turned to the direction of the ufo but i guess turn back around since the ship wasn't there anymore.

6. it either disappeared or it just went out of my frame since there was a turn i had to go on and i was looking around for it again but only saw the white stars.  while i was looking around for it and was making a video and put it on ig, i made that video at 8:02pm so this all happen around 8:00pm
content.summary: The ship was big like the one in independence day movie

content.detailedDescription: I was approaching the intersection of 100 s and 50 w. when a woman turned in in front of me and pulled up next to the field where i could see her looking at something. i looked over to the field and noticed a large stationary craft at quite a distance north northwest of albion in. i went north to see if i could get a closer clearer image for a picture, but when i came through the trees it was gone (maximum of 2 minutes.) the sky was clear blue with silver cast and i had 180 degree field of vision and there was no trace of it despite looking all across the sky over the next ten minutes. size was difficult to tell based on distance but i know it was at least as big as 2 goodyear blimps. color was hard to tell but i could discern metallic silvery white with some red orange but that could have been sun reflecting off the top. the shape was like two ovals connected at the end creating 2 levels.
content.summary: Large stationary object ne of albion in

content.detailedDescription: Sphere flying south on straight path shinning in the sun. thought it was a plane until it dropped about 500 fee on about a second or less. raised up about 3/4 of what it dropped then instantly fell to about the same elevation add last drop.  raised up about 100 feet and just vanishes in the brighter of a double rainbow.
content.summary: Spherical shinny object flying straight path then dropped instantly at terminal velocity, then raised 3/4 of drop fast, dropped again, raised slightly and disappears

content.detailedDescription: About 11:30pm friday oct 14, 2016 i went outside on my back patio and saw there was a nice full moon.  i was going to take a picture.  the night sky was clear.  i focused my phone camera toward the moon and at the bottom of the screen i saw a light that i thought was a star. i snapped the picture.  i wanted to take more so i aimed my camera again.  this time the light that i thought was a star moved and kept abruptly moving in various directions. suddenly it would disappear.  a second or so later reappear.  it did this several times then shot straight up behind the moon.  it came over the top of the moon as a larger red oval with a whitish green glowing center. i snapped a picture. then it disappeared.  i called into the house for my boyfriend to come outside to see what i was seeing on my camera.  it reappeared again under the moon as a star looking object only to repeat moving abruptly under the moon.  i snapped a picture.  again it shot straight up behind the moon.  it again came over the top of the moon as a larger red oval with a whitish green glowing center. i snapped a picture. it disappeared for a brief second and reappeared under the moon.  it still appeared as a larger oval with glowing center.  it stayed under the moon for several seconds.  i snapped a picture and in this one picture the moon is elongated and distorted as well as the oval object now has an glowing elongated center.  it then slowly disappeared.  none of this was visible to the naked eye.  since my phone battery was going out, i went into the house and grabbed my boyfriend's cell phone.  i ran back outside (a total of 15 seconds that i was in the house) stood on m patio in the same place and aimed my boyfriend's phone camera.  neither of us could see anything appear.  we waited about 20 seconds then put the camera onto video mode but after 1 minute of taping nothing showed up again.  i sent the pictures to my daughter to see what she thought.  my boyfriend and i looked over the pictures several times.  i posted them on my facebook and sent them to mufon.  i am truly excited to know what i saw.
content.summary: Object glowed white then green jutted behind moon then turned red w/center still glowing white

content.detailedDescription: Smoking talking  large orb in flight path over and over  same paterns   very fast  light shot from other direction so could not be a beacon  very fast plz watch footage  poor quality  but 3 of us watched it
content.summary: Large orb in egg flight path    very fast
